project.name: Mobomo
project.desc: Backend is developed using Ruby on Rails. iPhone applications are developed using Objective C and uses map framework, local database integration, web-service calls and remote server synchronization. Android applications are developed using Android SDK (Java platform).

project.name: addthis
project.desc: Software Development Kit that allows an iOS application developer to embed social sharing functionality into their own application.

project.name: Bozzuto - Octagon
project.desc: This project involves hosting the Octagon website which is a Bozzuto managed property. Minor tweaks/ changes are in scope at the prevailing development rates. Hosting is automatically renewed each year.

project.name: VR Assurance
project.desc: This project is to provide updates to VR Assurance app delivered to the client earlier.
